description:
112! is simple puzzle game to pass the time but extremely addictive.

-------------------------------

Inspired by some simple and trend games like link dot, connect dot, 2048.

Connect same numbers to merge into higher number.

Try to get number as higher as possible.

112! features

● Unlimited time, always free.
● Less battery life
● Simple interface beautifully
● Small size, run smoothly on iPhone and iPad
● Auto save the board so that you can keep playing whenever and wherever.

-------------------------------

If you are a fan of 112!, please visit us regularly at:

http://binbell.com/

And our last words to thank you for playing 112!, wish you exciting adventures in free time.
